typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{entry no} as integer,
		customer_no as string,
		customer_name as string,
		item_no as string,
		item_desc as string,
		item_qty as decimal(18,0),
		sold_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 100)) ~> salesRaw
source(output(
		{Entry No_} as integer,
		item_no as string,
		item_ref as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> referenceItem
salesRaw, referenceItem lookup(salesRaw@item_no == referenceItem@item_no,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc({Entry No_}, true),
	partitionBy('dynamicRange', 2,
		salesRaw@item_no
	),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(equals(salesRaw@item_no,referenceItem@item_no),
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 100)) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ismatch, nomatch)
ConditionalSplit1@ismatch sink(input(
		{entry no} as integer,
		customer_no as string,
		customer_name as string,
		item_no as string,
		item_desc as string,
		item_qty as decimal(18,0),
		sold_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		{entry no},
		customer_no,
		customer_name,
		item_no = item_ref,
		item_desc,
		item_qty,
		sold_date
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkmatch
ConditionalSplit1@nomatch sink(input(
		{entry no} as integer,
		customer_no as string,
		customer_name as string,
		item_no as string,
		item_desc as string,
		item_qty as decimal(18,0),
		sold_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		{entry no},
		customer_no,
		customer_name,
		item_no = {ConditionalSplit1@nomatch@item_no},
		item_desc,
		item_qty,
		sold_date
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinknomatch
